TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AddonDataHandler extends System.Object

Docs.summary: An abstract base class from which all implementations for data modules must derive.

remarks.para: Data modules are adapters used by the data extensibility mechanism to query data sources for which the server does not have built-in support. A data module is represented by a public class that derives from and implements its abstract methods: , , and . A data module class is dynamically loaded, instantiated, and used to query the corresponding data source. This only works if the data module is correctly deployed and registered with the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

remarks.para: A derived class must provide a default constructor.

Public MustOverride Function BeginGetData (context As HttpContext, callback As AsyncCallback, asyncState As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: abstract IAsyncResult ^ BeginGetData(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ asyncState);

Docs.param: An object that provides references to intrinsic server objects that are used to service HTTP requests.
The delegate to call when the asynchronous operation is complete.
Any extra data needed to process the request.
Docs.summary: An implementation of this method initiates an asynchronous request to the data source.
Docs.returns: An object that contains information about the status of the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

Docs.summary: An implementation of this method cancels the asynchronous request.

remarks.para: This method is called on all the data modules that did not complete the request operation in time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionString As String
public: property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the connection string used to connect to the data source.

remarks.para: The data extensibility framework sets this property before is invoked based on information from the DataConnection XML part of the requested document.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Data As DataSet
public: property System::Data::DataSet ^ Data { System::Data::DataSet ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a that describes the structure of the data requested by the server.

remarks.para: The data extensibility framework sets this property before is invoked based on information from the DataBinding XML Part of the requested document. The contains one . Each of the specifies the name of a column and the type of data on that column. The has no System.Data.DataRows.

Public MustOverride Function EndGetData (result As IAsyncResult) As DataSet

Docs.param: An object that contains information about the status of the operation.
Docs.summary: An implementation of this method ends the asynchronous request.
Docs.returns: A that contains the data retrieved from the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Exception ^ Error { Exception ^ get(); void set(Exception ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the exception that specifies the error that occurred while trying to retrieve data.
Docs.value: An object that describes the error.

remarks.para: A data module implementation must set this property if the request to the data sources failed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property QueryString As String
public: property System::String ^ QueryString { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the query string used to request source data.

remarks.para: The data extensibility framework sets this property before is invoked based on information from the DataConnection XML part of the requested document.
